title: Crack in the Road Exclusive Mix #4 – William Fitzsimmons
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/podcast4-copy-900x532.jpg "podcast4 copy")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5781-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-4-william-fitzsimmons/attachment/podcast4-copy)After the release of his newest record Gold in the Shadow, which has been received with fantastic critical acclaim so far, we were delighted when William agreed to put together a selection of some of his favourite tracks. Showing his primarily folk influences, including the likes of Nick Drake, Band of Horses and Crosby, Stills and Nash, it’s a wonderfully relaxing listen, what better way to spend a warm Saturday afternoon?

[Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #4: William Fitzsimmons](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-4-william-fitzsimmons/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Crackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
